SELECT A.WIKI_BKMK_ID, A.USER_ID USID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.USER_ID) USNM, A.WIKI_BKMK_NM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNWIKIBKMK A WHERE 1=1 AND A.FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId#
